results.title: Current evidence on drug therapy for dementia in people with Down syndrome: an overview of systematic reviews.
results.text_hl: Results: Five SRs were included, analyzing the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, antioxidants, @CHEMICAL_Acetylcarnitine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000108 @@@acetyl-L-carnitine@@@, anticonvulsants, acetylcholinesterase inhibitors (@CHEMICAL_Donepezil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077265 @@@donepezil@@@), NMDA receptor antagonists (@CHEMICAL_Memantine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008559 @@@memantine@@@), and fast-acting intranasal @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ symptoms in @DISEASE_Down_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D004314 @@@DS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: do Nascimento TG, do Nascimento ACL, Campos MA, Fernandes RAML. Current evidence on drug therapy for dementia in people with Down syndrome: an overview of systematic reviews. Dement Neuropsychol. 2025;19():e20240241. PMID: 40860508
citations.BibTeX: @article{40860508, title={Current evidence on drug therapy for dementia in people with Down syndrome: an overview of systematic reviews.}, author={do Nascimento TG and do Nascimento ACL and Campos MA and Fernandes RAML}, journal={Dement Neuropsychol}, volume={19}, pages={e20240241}}

results.title: A network-based systems genetics framework identifies pathobiology and drug repurposing in Parkinson's disease.
results.text_hl: Integrating network proximity-based drug repurposing and @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ electronic health record (EHR) data observations, we identified @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ as being significantly associated with reduced incidence of @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@ (hazard ratio (HR) = 0.91 for fall outcome, 95% confidence interval (CI): 0.87-0.94; HR = 0.88 for @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ outcome, 95% CI: 0.86-0.89) after adjusting for 267 covariates.

citations.NLM: Dou L, Xu Z, Xu J, Zang C, Su C, Pieper AA, Leverenz JB, Wang F, Zhu X, Cummings J, Cheng F. A network-based systems genetics framework identifies pathobiology and drug repurposing in Parkinson's disease. NPJ Parkinsons Dis. 2025 Jan 22;11(1):22. PMID: 39837893
citations.BibTeX: @article{39837893, title={A network-based systems genetics framework identifies pathobiology and drug repurposing in Parkinson's disease.}, author={Dou L and Xu Z and Xu J and Zang C and Su C and Pieper AA and Leverenz JB and Wang F and Zhu X and Cummings J and Cheng F}, journal={NPJ Parkinsons Dis}, volume={11}, number={1}, pages={22}}

results.title: Simvastatin is associated with a reduced incidence of dementia and Parkinson's disease
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is associated with a reduced incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ and @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@

citations.NLM: Wolozin B, Wang SW, Li NC, Lee A, Lee TA, Kazis LE. Simvastatin is associated with a reduced incidence of dementia and Parkinson's disease BMC Med. 2007 Jul 19;5():20. PMID: 17640385

results.title: Towards onset prevention of cognition decline in adults with Down syndrome (The TOP-COG study): A pilot randomised controlled trial
results.text_hl: Recruitment was from multiple general community sources over 12 months. Adults with @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ contraindications, were excluded.

citations.NLM: Cooper SA, Ademola T, Caslake M, Douglas E, Evans J, Greenlaw N, Haig C, Hassiotis A, Jahoda A, McConnachie A, Morrison J, Ring H, Starr J, Stiles C, Sirisena C, Sullivan F. Towards onset prevention of cognition decline in adults with Down syndrome (The TOP-COG study): A pilot randomised controlled trial Trials. 2016 Jul 29;17():370. PMID: 27473843

results.title: Effects of Statins on Incident Dementia in Patients with Type 2 DM: A Population-Based Retrospective Cohort Study in Taiwan
results.text_hl: Wolozin et al. reported that the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was associated with a strong reduction in the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen JM, Chang CW, Chang TH, Hsu CC, Horng JT, Sheu WH. Effects of Statins on Incident Dementia in Patients with Type 2 DM: A Population-Based Retrospective Cohort Study in Taiwan PLoS One. 2014;9(2):e88434. PMID: 24520388

results.title: Statins for the prevention of dementia.
results.text_hl: There was no difference in incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Dementia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ in HPS 2002 (31 cases in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group, 31 cases in placebo group) nor in performance on the modified Telephone Interview for Cognitive Status at final follow-up (23.7% @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitively impaired@@@ vs 24.2% in placebo group).

citations.NLM: McGuinness B, Craig D, Bullock R, Passmore P. Statins for the prevention of dementia. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2009 Apr 15;(2):CD003160. PMID: 19370582
